title: Pallookaville
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An American carnival food restaurant, began as a corn dog wagon and expanded to a brick and mortar joint. Offers some lacto-ovo vegetarian and a few vegan menu items/ Cartoons and old tv show and movies play on the screens only. Full soda fountain set up. Some of the blue plate sides are vegan suitable. Will make the veggie club vegan on request. Could get vegan "milkshakes."
